item.title: Here there be robots: A medieval map of Mars
item.description:
Here there be robots: A medieval map of Mars

It's hard to believe it's been over a year since the last time I posted something on this blog! I've actually made a lot of infographics in the meantime, but most of them are caught up in production with some of my collaborators.

item.title: [WATCH] PLACE YOUR BETS: MAKING THE CASE FOR YOUR FAVORITE BEST PICTURE NOMINEE
item.description:
[WATCH] PLACE YOUR BETS: MAKING THE CASE FOR YOUR FAVORITE BEST PICTURE NOMINEE

With only a few days to go before the Academy Awards, you need to bone up on your Best Picture nominees if you're going to win that office pool. But who has the time to see all 8 of those films? Film critics and the unemployed, that's who.

item.title: Finally on The Grid
item.description:
Finally on The Grid

After literally over a year past the expected delivery date, I'm finally writing on The Grid in their Beta round as a founding member. Doing my damnedest to read both side to the user feedback and judge for myself.Â
